definition[0]: if a part of someoneâ€™s body twitches, or if they twitch it, it makes a small sudden movement
example[0]: His mouth twitched slightly, and then he smiled.
definition[1]: to move something quickly and suddenly
example[2]: Sarah twitched the reins, and we moved off.
definition[2]: a quick movement of a muscle, especially one that you cannot control
example[4]: There was no movement in the house, not even a twitch of the curtains.
